name: StoryTeller Wireframe Kit Demo
description:
This is a demo version of the kit. Full version is available for purchase on UI8. Explore some editable components on the "Components & Styles" page ✌️


StoryTeller is a Wireframe Kit created to quickly draft websites. It contains more than 100 blocks in 15 categories that can be easily built into a complete wireframe in a few minutes! StoryTeller has minimum visual complexity and uses no bright colors (only neutrals) – all to keep your wireframes simple and leave room for creativity and exploration when you are ready to proceed to design your visuals.


Full version of StoryTeller includes:

  • 100 unique blocks
  • dark mode
  • auto-layouted components
  • component variants
  • global style guide
  • custom icons, logos
  • 4 px grid for even more control
